item.title: Scheme Review 1
item.author: finalwind42@gmail.com (Oyyko)
item.description: https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse341/04wi/lectures/14-scheme-quote.html Quote Scheme has a convenient syntax for representing data literals: prefix any expression with ’ (single quote) and the expression, rather than being evaluated, will be returned as data:
